entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugluktuk Airport 01:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -44.9°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:10 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
